data.eml:eml: Revision of Australian species of the dung beetle genus Lepanus (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae): description of 10 new species from the L. australis, L. monteithi, and L. villosus species groups

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gunter, Nicole L., Weir, Thomas A. (2019): Revision of Australian species of the dung beetle genus Lepanus (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae): description of 10 new species from the L. australis, L. monteithi, and L. villosus species groups. Zootaxa 4695 (3): 201-252, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4695.3.1
